title: Provided that out of amount so recovered as Infrastructural charges, 90% amount will go to Municipal Corporation and 10% amount will remain with SRA
clause_text: Provided that out of amount so recovered as Infrastructural charges, 90% amount will go to Municipal Corporation and 10% amount will remain with SRA.
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments :
